item.title: Visualize 2019 nem with WordCloud
item.description: This article is from [nem#2 Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/nem-2). Content of this article ① Extract only the characters from the nem related documents, ② Disassemble into parts of speech with Mecab and visualize with WordCloud. ③ Furthermore, it is not fun with just WordCloud, so add one time. #Environment Mac 10.15.1 Python 3.7.4 1. Extract only letters from nem-related documents By the way, what is the nem-related document that looks like a summary of 2019… I agree.
